name: Gangsta Sniper
description: Thirdperson shooter and survival game, where player is gangsta criminal. Mission to rob and collect hidden money bags. Also avoid or kill different enemies like zombies, mutants and cyborg soldiers.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 960M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 8.1 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 1000 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: direct x9
